title: Astrophysical & Planetary Sciences CCAT Fund
description: To provide support for the Cornell Caltech Atacama Telescope Project including travel, faculty & student stipends, capital expense, equipment and technology, and services in the Department of Astrophysical and Planetary Sciences at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Cornell Caltech Atacama Telescope Project including travel, faculty & student stipends, capital expense, equipment and technology, and services in the Department of Astrophysical and Planetary Sciences at CU Boulder.
